title: What's with the proposed new Katarina Splash art?
body:
PBE Katarina: [Imgur](http://i.imgur.com/YqoN7lL.jpg)  (Did she break her back from ulting wrong?)

Current Katarina: [Imgur](http://i.imgur.com/hG0lVuy.jpg)

New warring kingdoms Katarina:  [Imgur](http://i.imgur.com/JwhFLgz.jpg)


The current Katarina definitely needs an update.

The new warring kindoms Katarina looks very modern and in high quality.

But the new Katarina doesn't even look like the new skin at all?  This skin definitely needs tweaking and I sure do hope it won't be added, thoughts? (Plus it isn't even in that high of a quality either).

replies.body: The Kat PBE splash is horrible.
I saw a fixed version that looks a billion times better than the current PBE one. It fixes her god damn femur bone and knee. Seriously look at that her leg is bending instead of her knee.

1 - Theres like, 30km between her eye level and her nose
2 - Her posture is so rough
3 - I know Riot wants us to get a sense that she’s rushing forward but the spherical zoom thingy is too much
4 - Her anatomy is way too wrong

It has more booty.

MORE BOOTY = MORE PLAYERS.

See the logic there?
I like it  shows her movement  style and speed

Her new splash is awful, she went from being this beautiful assassin to this ugly monster, her body is completely out of shape, whats with all the new scars? Her face has been changed, overall its just a bad splash art there is nothing good about it, don't get why they made it so over the top with that background why couldn't they do a nice simple one like her old one. its silly.
